1: Adonai reigns—He is robed in majesty! Adonai has robed and armed Himself with strength. Yes, the world is firmly established—unshakable.
2: Your throne is established from of old. You are from everlasting.
3: The floods have lifted up, Adonai, the floods have lifted up their voice, the floods lift up their crashing waves.
4: More than the sounds of many waters— more majestic than the breakers of the sea— so majestic is Adonai on high!
5: Your testimonies are very sure. Holiness befits Your House, Adonai, for endless days.
